name: SEXPERIMENT
summary:
So, what is SEXPERIMENT? 
 
This is a sex simulator with excellent 3D graphics and an original storyline. At first glance, everything is simple, but do not rush to conclusions. A variety of characters, fucking in different poses - this is just a beautiful wrapper for the main action. 
 
The essence of the game - experiments, expressed in the selection of suitable characters and their achievement of certain goals. It can be the achievement of orgasm by one of the characters for a certain time or vice versa, keep they an excited state for as long as possible. 
 
Each character has its own unique characteristics. The success of the experiment depends both on the successful selection of the pair, and on the management of their sex - changes in the speed of movements, change of poses and so on. 
 
All graphics, locations and characters are created individually and with attention to detail. We constantly improve something and try to make the game even more beautiful. And the sounds of course :) This is not some kind of capture sound from porn video. Our voice acting is recorded, khm... in real conditions)) 
 
The game is currently under development, not all described functions are fully implemented. Be patient)
